The root parts were then digitized using SmartRoot (Lobet et al., 2011), an ImageJ plugin, the segment lengths and the lateral position on their parent root were exported as text file in csv format.
HydroRoot was developed as a component of the OpenAlea platform (Pradal et al., 2008).
The roots were scanned, and the diameters were estimated using ImageJ.
The root parts were then digitized using SmartRoot (Lobet et al., 2011), an ImageJ plugin, the segment lengths and the lateral position on their parent root were exported as text file in csv format.
